data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Correa, Margarita, Aguirre, Carlos, Germain, Jean-François, Hinrichsen, Patricio, Zaviezo, Tania, Malausa, Thibaut, Prado, Ernesto (2011): A new species of Pseudococcus (Hemiptera: Pseudococcidae) belonging to the “ Pseudococcus maritimus ” complex from Chile: molecular and morphological description. Zootaxa 2926: 46-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205308
